allow: Bash(python3 -c " import sys, re src = sys.stdin.read\(\) # Find the section where nodeContent is called and rendered idx = src.find\(''nodeContent''\) while idx != -1: snippet = src[max\(0,idx-100\):idx+200] if ''innerHTML'' in snippet or ''html\('' in snippet or ''append'' in snippet.lower\(\): print\(''---''\) print\(snippet\) idx = src.find\(''nodeContent'', idx+1\) ")
